name: IxFlow Card
description:
Rapid interaction design without wireframes or mockups.


Features

  • widget card with output in the top (e.g. what user sees) and primary input in the bottom (e.g. what user clicks)
  • possibility for adding alternative input paths (e.g. what else user clicks or types in),
  • 5 input types: click, say, type, select, wait,
  • 3 output types: see, hear and feel (e.g. vibration and other haptic feedback),
  • light/dark mode.


Your feedback

We highly appreciate your ideas and bug reports. Please add them to the feedback board and feel free to follow our updates on the news page.
